```{r}
library(rvest)

teams <- c("athletic", "atletico", "barcelona", "real-madrid")

url_parse<- read_html("https://www.laliga.es/estadisticas-historicas/plantillas/primera/2017-18/athletic")


for (i in 1:length(teams)) {
  url <- read_html(paste("https://www.laliga.es/estadisticas-historicas/plantillas/primera/2017-18/", teams[i], sep=""))
  col_name<- url %>%
  html_nodes("th") %>%
  html_text()

  mydata <- url %>%
  html_nodes("td") %>%
  html_text()

  
  finaldata <- data.frame(matrix(mydata, ncol=10, byrow=TRUE))
  names(finaldata) <- col_name
}
    

finaldata
```
